EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent to Internal and External user when Grant Closeout is created by Project Manager
EmailTemplate.name: Notification of Grant Closeout Creation Project Manager
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: New Closeout {!Closeout__c.Name} has been Created.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Annual Close Out {!Closeout__c.Name} available for submission.
Hello {!Closeout__c.AwardSubAwardee__c},
This email is to notify you that Annual Closeout request - {!GO__Closeout__c.Name} - available for submission.
Grant Number: {!Closeout__c.GrantName__c}
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
